# [Interview #134: Rotterdam Signing Report - Aan'allein, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=134#11)

#### Aan'allein

How are
*stedding*
created?

#### Robert Jordan

Read And Find Out.

#### Aan'allein

I really should have phrased it differently, talking about the presence of the Ogier infusing the land or something.
